item.title: Can you use a class in C? · Effective program synthesis
Prestige Over Influence: Choosing A More Impactful Online Presence
item.description: The world of software engineering influencers, what I typically like to refer to as “tech-fluencers”, has grown significantly in the last few years. There are people who have built entire personal brands and businesses solely on the basis of their online tech content. And many massive technology companies now participate in the same spheres that 5 years ago would have been unheard of (just think about all the memes major tech companies have created in the last few years).
